member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsAccess
member.summary: Specifies if an article can only be accessed with a registration or subscription

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsAccess.Subscription
member.summary: Article requires a subscription.

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsAccess.Registration
member.summary: Article requires a registration.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsPublication
member.summary: Specifies the publication in which the article appears

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsPublication.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of NewsPublication
member.param: Name of the news publication
The language of the publication

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsPublication.Name
member.summary: Name of the news publication. It must exactly match the name as it appears on your articles in news.google.com, omitting any trailing parentheticals. For example, if the name appears in Google News as "The Example Times (subscription)", you should use the name, "The Example Times".

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsPublication.Language
member.summary: The language of the publication. It should be an ISO 639 Language Code (either 2 or 3 letters). Exception: For Chinese, please use zh-cn for Simplified Chinese or zh-tw for Traditional Chinese.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews
member.summary: Encloses all information about the news article.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.#ctor(SimpleMvcSitemap.News.NewsPublication,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.param: Specifies the publication in which the article appears
Article publication date
The title of the news article.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.Publication
member.summary: Specifies the publication in which the article appears.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.Access
member.summary: Possible values include "Subscription" or "Registration", describing the accessibility of the article. If the article is accessible to Google News readers without a registration or subscription, this tag should be omitted.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.Genres
member.summary: A comma-separated list of properties characterizing the content of the article. Values: PressRelease (visible): an official press release. Satire (visible): an article which ridicules its subject for didactic purposes. Blog (visible): any article published on a blog, or in a blog format. OpEd: an opinion-based article which comes specifically from the Op-Ed section of your site. Opinion: any other opinion-based article not appearing on an Op-Ed page, i.e., reviews, interviews, etc. UserGenerated: newsworthy user-generated content which has already gone through a formal editorial review process on your site.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.PublicationDate
member.summary: Article publication date Please ensure that you give the original date and time at which the article was published on your site; do not give the time at which the article was added to your Sitemap.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.Title
member.summary: The title of the news article. Note: The title may be truncated for space reasons when shown on Google News. Article title tags should only include the title of the article as it appears on your site. Please make sure not to include the author name, the publication name, or publication date as part of the title tag.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.Keywords
member.summary: A comma-separated list of keywords describing the topic of the article.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.StockTickers
member.summary: A comma-separated list of up to 5 stock tickers of the companies, mutual funds, or other financial entities that are the main subject of the article. Relevant primarily for business articles. Each ticker must be prefixed by the name of its stock exchange, and must match its entry in Google Finance. For example, "NASDAQ:AMAT" (but not "NASD:AMAT"), or "BOM:500325" (but not "BOM:RIL").

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.News.SitemapNews.ShouldSerializeAccess
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapIndexModel.Nodes
member.summary: Index nodes linking to sitemap files.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapIndexNode
member.summary: Encapsulates information about an individual Sitemap.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapIndexNode.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The URL.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapIndexNode.Url
member.summary: Identifies the location of the Sitemap. This location can be a Sitemap, an Atom file, RSS file or a simple text file.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapIndexNode.LastModificationDate
member.summary: Identifies the time that the corresponding Sitemap file was modified. It does not correspond to the time that any of the pages listed in that Sitemap were changed. By providing the last modification timestamp, you enable search engine crawlers to retrieve only a subset of the Sitemaps in the index i.e. a crawler may only retrieve Sitemaps that were modified since a certain date. This incremental Sitemap fetching mechanism allows for the rapid discovery of new URLs on very large sites.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapIndexNode.ShouldSerializeLastModificationDate
member.summary: Provides the base URL for converting relative URLs to absolute ones

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapModel
member.summary: Encapsulates the sitemap file and references the current protocol standard.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapModel.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Sitemap nodes.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapModel.Nodes
member.summary: Sitemap nodes linking to documents

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode
member.summary: Encloses all information about a specific URL.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a sitemap node
member.param: Specifies the URL. For images and video, specifies the landing page (aka play page).

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.Url
member.summary: URL of the page. This URL must begin with the protocol (such as http) and end with a trailing slash, if your web server requires it. This value must be less than 2,048 characters.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.LastModificationDate
member.summary: Shows the date the URL was last modified, value is optional.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.ChangeFrequency
member.summary: How frequently the page is likely to change. This value provides general information to search engines and may not correlate exactly to how often they crawl the page.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.Priority
member.summary: The priority of this URL relative to other URLs on your site. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0. This value does not affect how your pages are compared to pages on other sites—it only lets the search engines know which pages you deem most important for the crawlers. The default priority of a page is 0.5. Please note that the priority you assign to a page is not likely to influence the position of your URLs in a search engine's result pages. Search engines may use this information when selecting between URLs on the same site, so you can use this tag to increase the likelihood that your most important pages are present in a search index. Also, please note that assigning a high priority to all of the URLs on your site is not likely to help you. Since the priority is relative, it is only used to select between URLs on your site.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.Images
member.summary: Additional information about important images on the page. It can include up to 1000 images.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.News
member.summary: Additional information about news article on the page.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.Video
member.summary: Additional information about video content on the page.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.Mobile
member.summary: Specifies if the linked document is mobile friendly.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.Translations
member.summary: Alternative language versions of the URL

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.ShouldSerializeLastModificationDate
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.SitemapNode.ShouldSerializeChangeFrequency
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.param: The URL to the translation page
The locale for the other resource, e.g. 'de-DE'

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Translations.SitemapPageTranslation.Url

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Translations.SitemapPageTranslation.Rel
member.summary: Defaults to alternate

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Translations.SitemapPageTranslation.Language
member.summary: The locale of the alternative version, e.g. de-DE

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo
member.summary: Encloses all information about the video.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of SitemapVideo
member.param: The title of the video. Maximum 100 characters.
The description of the video. Maximum 2048 characters.
A URL pointing to the actual video media file. This file should be in .mpg, .mpeg, .mp4, .m4v, .mov, .wmv, .asf, .avi, .ra, .ram, .rm, .flv, or other video file format.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer)
member.summary: Creates an instance of SitemapVideo
member.param: The title of the video. Maximum 100 characters.
The description of the video. Maximum 2048 characters.
A URL pointing to a player for a specific video.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ThumbnailUrl
member.summary: A URL pointing to the video thumbnail image file. Images must be at least 160 x 90 pixels and at most 1920x1080 pixels. We recommend images in .jpg, .png, or. gif formats.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Title
member.summary: The title of the video. Maximum 100 characters. The title must be in plain text only, and any HTML entities should be escaped or wrapped in a CDATA block.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Description
member.summary: The description of the video. Maximum 2048 characters. The description must be in plain text only, and any HTML entities should be escaped or wrapped in a CDATA block.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ContentUrl
member.summary: You must specify at least one of <video:player_loc> or <video:content_loc>. A URL pointing to the actual video media file. This file should be in .mpg, .mpeg, .mp4, .m4v, .mov, .wmv, .asf, .avi, .ra, .ram, .rm, .flv, or other video file format. Providing this file allows Google to generate video thumbnails and video previews, and can help Google verify your video. Best practice: Ensure that only Googlebot accesses your content by using a reverse DNS lookup.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Player
member.summary: You must specify at least one of <video:player_loc> or <video:content_loc>. A URL pointing to a player for a specific video. Usually this is the information in the src element of an <embed> tag and should not be the same as the content of the <loc> tag. ​

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Duration
member.summary: The duration of the video in seconds. Value must be between 0 and 28800 (8 hours).

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ExpirationDate
member.summary: The date after which the video will no longer be available, in W3C format. Don't supply this information if your video does not expire.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Rating
member.summary: The rating of the video. Allowed values are float numbers in the range 0.0 to 5.0.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ViewCount
member.summary: The number of times the video has been viewed.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.PublicationDate
member.summary: The date the video was first published, in W3C format.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.FamilyFriendly
member.summary: No if the video should be available only to users with SafeSearch turned off.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Tags
member.summary: A tag associated with the video. Tags are generally very short descriptions of key concepts associated with a video or piece of content. A single video could have several tags, although it might belong to only one category. For example, a video about grilling food may belong in the Grilling category, but could be tagged "steak", "meat", "summer", and "outdoor". Create a new <video:tag> element for each tag associated with a video. A maximum of 32 tags is permitted.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Category
member.summary: The video's category. For example, cooking. The value should be a string no longer than 256 characters. In general, categories are broad groupings of content by subject. Usually a video will belong to a single category. For example, a site about cooking could have categories for Broiling, Baking, and Grilling.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Restriction
member.summary: List of countries where the video may or may not be played. Only one <video:restriction> tag can appear for each video. If there is no <video:restriction> tag, it is assumed that the video can be played in all territories.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Gallery
member.summary: A link to the gallery (collection of videos) in which this video appears. Only one <video:gallery_loc> tag can be listed for each video.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Prices
member.summary: The price to download or view the video. Do not use this tag for free videos. More than one <video:price> element can be listed (for example, in order to specify various currencies, purchasing options, or resolutions).

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.RequiresSubscription
member.summary: Indicates whether a subscription (either paid or free) is required to view the video. Allowed values are yes or no.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Uploader
member.summary: The video uploader's name. Only one <video:uploader> is allowed per video.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Platform
member.summary: A list of space-delimited platforms where the video may or may not be played. Allowed values are web, mobile, and tv. Only one <video:platform> tag can appear for each video. If there is no <video:platform> tag, it is assumed that the video can be played on all platforms.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.Live
member.summary: Indicates whether the video is a live stream. Allowed values are yes or no.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeDuration
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeExpirationDate
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeRating
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeViewCount
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializePublicationDate
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeFamilyFriendly
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeRequiresSubscription
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.SitemapVideo.ShouldSerializeLive
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoGallery
member.summary: A node for specifying the gallery which the video appears.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoGallery.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of video gallery
member.param: A link to the gallery (collection of videos) in which this video appears

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoGallery.Title
member.summary: The optional attribute title indicates the title of the gallery.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoGallery.Url
member.summary: A link to the gallery (collection of videos) in which this video appears

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer
member.summary: Encapsulates the information about player URL

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of VideoPlayer
member.param: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer.AllowEmbed
member.summary: The optional attribute allow_embed specifies whether Google can embed the video in search results. Allowed values are Yes or No.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer.Autoplay
member.summary: The optional attribute autoplay has a user-defined string (in the example above, ap=1) that Google may append (if appropriate) to the flashvars parameter to enable autoplay of the video. For example: <embed src="http://www.example.com/videoplayer.swf?video=123" autoplay="ap=1"/>.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer.Url
member.summary: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPlayer.ShouldSerializeAllowEmbed
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice
member.summary: The price to download or view the video.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.#ctor(System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Creates an instance of VideoPrice
member.param: Specifies the currency in ISO 4217 format
The price to download or view the video.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.Currency
member.summary: The required attribute currency specifies the currency in ISO 4217 format.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.Type
member.summary: The optional attribute type specifies the purchase option. Allowed values are rent and own. If this is not specified, the default value is own.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.Resolution
member.summary: The optional attribute resolution specifies the purchased resolution. Allows values are HD and SD.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.Value
member.summary: The price to download or view the video.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.ShouldSerializeType
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPrice.ShouldSerializeResolution
member.summary: Used for not serializing null values.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPurchaseOption
member.summary: Purchase option for a video.

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPurchaseOption.None
member.summary: Default value, won't be serialized.

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPurchaseOption.Rent
member.summary: Video can be rented.

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPurchaseOption.Own
member.summary: Video can be owned

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoPurchaseResolution
member.summary: Resolution for the specified video

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestriction
member.summary: List of countries where the video may or may not be played.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestriction.#ctor(System.String,SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestrictionRelationship)
member.summary: Creates an instance of VideoRestriction
member.param: A space-delimited list of countries where the video may or may not be played. Allowed values are country codes in ISO 3166 format.
Specifies whether the video is restricted or permitted for the specified countries.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestriction.Relationship
member.summary: The required attribute "relationship" specifies whether the video is restricted or permitted for the specified countries. Allowed values are allow or deny.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestriction.Countries
member.summary: A space-delimited list of countries where the video may or may not be played. Allowed values are country codes in ISO 3166 format.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestrictionRelationship
member.summary: Specifies if a video may or may not be played for the given countries.

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestrictionRelationship.Allow
member.summary: Video can be played in specified countries.

member.name: F:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoRestrictionRelationship.Deny
member.summary: Video can't be played in specified countries.

member.name: T:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoUploader
member.summary: Info about the uploader of the video.

member.name: M:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoUploader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of VideoUploader
member.param: The video uploader's name.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoUploader.Info
member.summary: The optional attribute info specifies the URL of a webpage with additional information about this uploader. This URL must be on the same domain as the <loc> tag.

member.name: P:SimpleMvcSitemap.Videos.VideoUploader.Name
member.summary: The video uploader's name.
